website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-clean Pyrex pan has a wider lip to make it easier to take out of the oven.
pros: A solid pie pan that cooks smoothly and evenly
Has a wide scalloped edge to help flute the sides of your pie crust  beautifully
Clear material helps you see when your pie crust is done
It's just a little wider than some of the other pie pans at 9.5"
cons: This pan is dishwasher safe, but it should be only placed on the top rack
Glass is more fragile than other materials

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Pie Plate
customer_reviews.text: I have used these pie plates a handful of times without incident (and have had pyrex pie plates in the past without any problems) - roasting vegetables, quiches, pies, etc. - until a few days ago when I pulled a pie crust out of the oven and placed it on the counter. Thankfully, I walked across the kitchen right after, and so was not in close proximity when the dish exploded just moments later. Do not purchase these plates; they are dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles

customer_reviews.title: 99 NEGATIVE STARS IF I COULD
customer_reviews.text: Glass pie plate SHATTERED in 350 degree oven WITH OUR THANKSGIVING PIE IN IT. First (and last) use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these pie plates!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY MY PIE PLATE EXPLODED ALL OVER MY KITCHEN!! Cooking quiche at 350 degrees! So scary!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauracj

customer_reviews.title: Deeper than normal pie plates, but I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these pie dishes! They're deeper than the disposable aluminum pie dishes that you buy at the grocery store, so I have to roll my bottom dough to about 13-14" diameter. I like the depth, though, because it allows me to make pies with extra fruit. (So far, I've only used them for fruit pies and the occasional brownie.) The bottom crust also seems to crisp up well in them. I haven't had any problems with the plates exploding. I usually bake them 30-60 minutes in a 350*F-375*F oven. -- (Daniel's wife)
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deep dish pie plate
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a bit of problem with this item. Love the scallop edge. Have used repeatedly in 350 oven. I let it soak to remove any burned food. No problem with clean-up after soak. I hand wash everything. Bought these to replace glass pie dishes that were lost in a move. Glad I bought the deep dish size this time, much more useful than regular size. The price was great. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: magickbetty

customer_reviews.title: Typical Recipes Are For 9-Inch Pies
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality pie dishes, but do note that they are 9.5 and most recipes are for a standard 9 inch pie, so this can slightly impact ingredient amounts and cooking times...a minor complaint, but something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex 2-Pack Easy Grab Glass Pie Plate
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex pie plates that are deep, well-made and very presentable. After reading the instruction/care booklet I called the customer service number to be certain about using them in preheated ovens and which oven types are suitable; the representative gave me specific and helpful information.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Exploding Pie Plate.
customer_reviews.text: This pie plate exploded in my sink. I used it for the first time the other night, after we had a few slides I placed it into the fridge. Next day, I placed plate from fridge to the sink. A minute later, heard a loud noise and came to find the plate shattered into pieces inside my sink! I’m just glad it happened in my sink, and not on my countertop, so it was at least somewhat contained. First and last time I go with a glass pie dish.
customer_reviews.author: James Sae

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! These are dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Just took this out of my oven and put it on my stove top. The whole thing just combusted with my 3 young children in the kitchen!!! I'm absolutely FURIOUS! MY CHILDREN COULD HAVE BEEN SERIOUSLY HURT!
customer_reviews.author: Kareem and Samantha Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: I'm baking pies now, thanks to these
customer_reviews.text: OK, I'm a guy and the kitchen is not really my domain. Being single again I am learning to cook and bake. I always loved the taste of great home made pies. Did my homework and bought 4 of these on sale. With my new gas stove and some help from my lady friends I am now baking some great looking and tasting pies. Being able to view how the crust is doing through the glass pie plates and without having to open the oven is a real plus. The oven temp stays where I want it. One caution though, home made pies can be addicting.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Turner

customer_reviews.title: great new design
customer_reviews.text: I have been using 9 inch pyrex pie plates/baking pans my whole life and inherited my mom's. I am always missing pie pans because I often bake for others. I ordered these in anticipation of losing a few pie plates/pans at Thanksgiving. I was thinking these would be my backup pans, however the new design with the extended rim the entire circumference of the pan is wonderful! No more having to find the little extensions! You can grab any part of the pan. It sounds trivial but it makes a big difference when baking and handling pies. These are now my preferred pie pans. I love these Pie baking dishes!
customer_reviews.author: tcb

customer_reviews.title: ... first 2 times I used the pie pans I loved them but the 3rd I pulled my pie crust ...
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 times I used the pie pans I loved them but the 3rd I pulled my pie crust out if the oven and the pan exploded pieces everywhere. It was very scary and it completely ruined my pie.
customer_reviews.author: Preccious Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Plate Shattered
customer_reviews.text: After using one of the two for the first time, I placed it in my sink and ran hot water into it. Within seconds it shattered into a million pieces, even some of it went down the drain/disposal. I had a heck of a time fishing out all the pieces, cutting myself in the process. I had and still have many pieces of Pyrex that I love using. This is the first time I’ve had a problem. I’m hesitant to use the other one now. One of the cooking sites I follow recommended this particular plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high-quality plates, easy to grab out of the oven
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this set of pie plates. They are sturdy and well-made from heavy glass. The fluted edge is pretty and allows them to be easily moved without damaging the pie crust. They are slightly larger than my other Anchor Hocking pie plates, which means sometimes the filling looks a little less... full. I tend to use them for pies that are bigger, like apple pie. A very good value, since my non-stick pie pans had all corroded and rusted quickly from knife cuts and washing. These go easily in the dishwasher and they look far more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Micabe

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pie baking
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice standard pie plate but they were quite a bit deeper than I expected. I have some old Pyrex pie pans from my mom that are the same size but tinted glass and I wanted some clear glass. It probably said the dimensions somewhere on here but I figured it was a standard size. The good news about these pie pans is that it can hold a lot of filling. If you’re a baker these are a must have in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: One exploded on me after an hour at 350
customer_reviews.text: After maybe 10 uses one exploded in the oven on me when I tried to take it out after baking a pie in it for an hour. The oven was only set to 350. Glass and molten pie went everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: One pie dish arrived with a crack in the glass. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I like the prompt delivery and the size and design, however, one pie dish arrived with a crack on the underside of the dish, 2 1/2" long, which I would definitely not be able to bake in it. The box the set was packaged in was undamaged however, the pie plates additional cushioning for protection was insufficient. Would appreciate a replacement please. This is my second request. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how thick these pie plates are. Nothing whimpy about them! I have not used them yet, but I do not anticipate any problems, especially with shattering. [The incidents I read about were several years ago & surely Pyrex would have subsequently taken suspect batches off the market to avoid liability issues.]
customer_reviews.author: Cork

customer_reviews.title: Using as plant saucers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use as saucers for my indoor plants. Perfect fit and height. Looks sooooooo much better than tacky plastic ones. colorful glass stones can be added for a splash of color
customer_reviews.author: ann p.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: These pie pans are the best! I was only shopping for one, but the two of them were cheaper than one of any other kind. They are very sturdy and strong. I make crust less quiche in them because I am eating low carb, and they clean up perfectly in the dishwasher! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love Pyrex, but one plate shattered
customer_reviews.text: We love Pyrex products and haven’t had any trouble with them in the past. We made a pie over the weekend, and as we were pulling one of the pies out, the glass shattered everywhere. The other pie came out fine, so we aren’t sure if we got a faulty plate or it had a tiny crack.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Winters

customer_reviews.title: Double check before using
customer_reviews.text: I used both pie plates at one time, cooking the same thing in them for the same amount of time. When I took them out of the oven to cool, one of them literally exploded. Glass went everywhere, the entire plate was shattered. Luckily I was far enough from it that I didnt get any cuts. Not sure what happened but I will certainly think twice before using the other one
customer_reviews.author: M REYNOLDS

customer_reviews.title: Great value for sturdy pie plates.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price for these Pyrex pie plates. They’re usually $8 each. I love the easy grip sides and the deep dish. We just put hem in the dishwasher to clean. I have Pyrex that I received as wedding gifts over 30 years ago and they’re still performing beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: WestTexasConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Presentation with these plates
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive these. They are such a nice size and when presenting a pie, you have a PRESENTATION. I bout the Miles Kimbal Pie Keepers when I bought these and those pies plates fit PERFECTLY in them. I have to travel with these pies and putting them in a container worked perfectly cuz they can stack. These are high quality thick pie plates. I would use other. Believe me, you won't be sorry.,
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Loves these DEEP and wide brim glass pie plates
customer_reviews.text: Many pie plates are too shallow for my tastes. I love to have the pie plate on the deeper side, to help avoid the bubbling over into my oven, which ruins my day. Also these pie plates have a wide brim, making it easier to "pinch" the rim and help contain the pie contents. I bought 2 sets of these plates and have baked pies as gifts. Great value and quality pie plates.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Fall

customer_reviews.title: Best pie plates going
customer_reviews.text: Great pie plates. Use them in heavy rotation. Won't lie, have burned a few pies (my bad) and have dropped them but haven't had one break in it out of the oven. Easy to handle, heavy duty stuff here. Way easy to clean. The price is right for two.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGuest

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. They are definitely Pyrex quality and am completely happy with the purchase. They were well packed so there was no damage during shipping. The edges of the pie dishes or so pretty they could double as a type of serving dish.
customer_reviews.author: michelle fuhr

customer_reviews.title: Not for every pie type
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about edges of pie plates and the laying of pie crust. Prefer a smaller and smoother edge so will only use for pies with top and bottom crust. Pumpkin pie crust didn’t work out so well due to large lip on plate. Due to low price I didn’t return after receiving.
customer_reviews.author: Happymom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pie plates
customer_reviews.text: Note that these pie plates are 9.5" in diameter, so I had to increase my typical pie crust recipe for 9" pies to make enough dough to fit the plates well. But not a problem, and they are truly beautiful. They have replaced my old Corning plates as favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Mason

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Pyrex
customer_reviews.text: I really needed these and the price was so affordable! Pyrex glass is a staple in my house! The fluted edges make it so easy to make an attractive pie. I plan on ordering the 9 inch size because the 9.5 is good for the deep dish recipes. Great product great price.
customer_reviews.author: J.Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cheesecake
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to make cheesecake in, even for a husband! My husband made a few cheesecakes. They were easy to clean and no issues with sticking. They are a great size and easily storable.
customer_reviews.author: N Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Large and deep
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see anything in the description about these being deep dish, but they are. I found I needed to increase the dough amount by 30% and the filling amount by 40% as compared to a normal size pie plate. I've only used these three times; no problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lissie

customer_reviews.title: Who Likes Pie?
customer_reviews.text: These Pyrex pie plates are beautiful. Pyrex makes the best glass baking products ever. They clean up well and no teflon to scratch. These are just great. Gonna make a pie now.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Really are "Easy Grab"
customer_reviews.text: I love these pie plates - they have an extra wide lip around the top that makes them MUCH easier to get into and out of the oven. I prefer glass pie plates so I can keep an eye on the bottom crust. All of my pies came out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter set. My mom stole one after I baked her an apple pie during holiday because she loved it so much. Affordable, durable, haven’t had issues with scratches or chipping and very pretty for clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cree

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex Pie Plate
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what they are supposed to be. I feel like the top outer edge is larger than it needs to be. It is just large enough that it does not fit well on my shelves. Other than that, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ratz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fluted pie pans
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, fluted edge, glass pie pans. I use pre-made deep dish pie crusts in aluminum pie pans that are flimsy to put in oven and remove, without a supportive cookie sheet. These pie pans allow me to place my aluminum pie pans inside and bake perfectly and easy to put in oven and remove and transport pies safely
customer_reviews.author: Katie burris

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The pie plates are nice and sturdy, but a nightmare to clean. They come in a plain box (mine was a bit damaged) so i dont think they are giftable at all
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied, very study, cooks well, typical Pyrex product.
customer_reviews.text: These pie dishes work great, they have a very wide edge, so you will have to make a larger crust batch to cover the full edge and not run short. Also, these pie plates do not have a deep scallop edge so you will get a more flat crust edge than some other pie plates.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality for $$
customer_reviews.text: I love Pyrex bakeware because it looks amazing to serve in AND you can really keep from over cooking or undercooking your pie crusts if you keep a close eye. THESE dishes are an amazing deal for any baker and despite reading the description, they seemed bigger when I got them, which is TOTALLY even better! Let the Great American Home Baking Show Begin!
customer_reviews.author: Marlaina

customer_reviews.title: Gotta LOVE ceramic...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! You must read all the directions before use. Do not put a hot plate on a cold suface.....and vice versa... I made a spectacular breakfast quiche, and will use these pie plates for many years to come...
customer_reviews.author: Magicmary

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLY HIGH GRADE FOR THE PRICE. SO HAPPY AS I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR PIE BAKING IN GLASS FOR A WHILE. HIGHLY RECOMMEND AND WELL PACKED. SO LOVELY THE CAN BE USED FOR TABLE SETTINGS TOO NOT JUST PIE. GREAT GIFT IDEA.
customer_reviews.author: Daleen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Bakes pies and quiches beautifully!!
customer_reviews.text: Bakes pies and quiches beautifully!!! Please note...these are deep dish size...so beware when making pie dough from scratch that you take amounts into account as most recipes are for less deep 9 inch plates.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Bakun

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend! I’m completely in love with this product. And the fact that it came with two pie pans was a WIN for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pie Plate
customer_reviews.text: These pie plate are amazing. Not only are they Pyrex but the edge of the plate is crimped! A beautiful and useful pie plate.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Shattered before ever getting to use
customer_reviews.text: This pie plate shattered in my hands while washing with a sponge. It had never been put in the oven or used. I am left with cuts on my fingers, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t.
customer_reviews.text: I baked a pie and it was sitting on a stovetop. Oven and every burner were off. The pie was baked 2 days prior. It randomly exploded, I’m guessing the glass was weakened at original bake time. No change in temperature or anything. These pans are not worth the risk. I will not be using my other one.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal
customer_reviews.text: These pie plates are 10" DEEP dish plates! And you get 2 at a great price!! My last deep dish pie plate was on the expensive side, and it was the least expensive I could find. I bake a lot, and Pyrex never lets me down. Being clear I can easily check the crusts. Highly recommend these! They also make great family pot pies!
customer_reviews.author: Moonminx

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, heavy pie plates that are east to use and clean. Better used if you make your own pie crust as it’s bigger than the premade kind of crust that you buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: D. Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Pie Plates
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of Pyrex and these pie plates are just as great as the rest. I know that others have had issues with breakage but I never have. I follow the care directions and use accordingly. I hope I don't have any pie plates explode I would be very sad to lose a nice dish.
customer_reviews.author: SarahH

customer_reviews.title: Nice large pie baker❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I like that the pan is deep enough to pile a lot of apples in (over 980 grams) and the rim helps to construct a nice edge.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Ledge
customer_reviews.text: Finally, Pyrex as come out with Pie Plates that have an edge upon which crust can be perched. For years, I bought ceramic pie plates because they usually had a generous lip for the flared part of the crust. Happy to see that Pyrex has improved their pie plates.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brian Lamm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Pyrex pie plates
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Pyrex pie plates. Be aware, though, that these are way too big if you buy one of those standard pre-made pie crusts they sell in the refrigerator section at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these before Thanksgiving to gift along with homemade pies. They are economical & receivers don't have to worry about returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Saved By Grace

customer_reviews.title: Item came chipped, but could be a fluke
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived chipped but still useable. So price was cheaper than most, but I guess you get what you pay for. I like the depth of the pan- most pie pans I've had in the past are fairly shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are larger than I thought but will be very nice to make pies or pot pies. 5 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ky gal

customer_reviews.title: I used two of these to make whipped sweet potatoes with marshmallows on top over the holidays
customer_reviews.text: I used two of these to make whipped sweet potatoes with marshmallows on top over the holidays. One cooked just fine and the other exploded - not just the food, but the glass. I have always trusted Pyrex, and this is the first time this has happened. No idea what happened.
customer_reviews.author: James W Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Thick and lovely
customer_reviews.text: These pie plate will never be old. They are timeless little beauties!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great pie plates
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves using these for making her quiche; can't go wrong with pyrex
customer_reviews.author: Paul F Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: dependable pyrex bakeware!
customer_reviews.text: I have only made one pie in these so far -- in fact I just took it out of the oven -- but I highly recommend these pie pans. They are a bit bigger than metal pie plates though, so be aware if that's what you're used to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and sturdy pie plate. The finish product looks much presentable. love them!
customer_reviews.author: rmisasa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy deep dish pie dishes
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with these. I needed glass pans so picked these up. I was surprised as they seem kind of big for a pie but I suppose you would make a deep dish pie with them. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: great pie pans
customer_reviews.text: I just received them yesterday, already used them to make a pot pie. Came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: reena salas

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: These are much bigger and deeper than normal pie plates. They're going to make enormous pies!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Geat Pie Plates
customer_reviews.text: The pie plates arrived on time and in good condition. We use them for pies, quiches, etc. I'm very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Paciocco

customer_reviews.title: Love these pie pans!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pie pans. They are super study and regularly help make good looking and good tasting pies. It’s “giftable” in that I would be stoked to receive these as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K

customer_reviews.title: Consider the Edges
customer_reviews.text: I love pyrex pie pans, the only problems with these is the are 1/2in bigger than recommended for and recipe making pies a little shallow. The fancy edges also make it difficult to make the crust sit right
customer_reviews.author: Peanut Pamcakes

customer_reviews.title: great price very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I needed some all season pie pans and these really fit the bill also great for reheating things in the microwave and pretty to boot
customer_reviews.author: K A K

customer_reviews.title: Pie Dish Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to make a quiche and it came out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Aishah54

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous dishes!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? These dishes are wonderful. They don't look cheap. They are durable, well made, and bake great pies or quiches! They make excellent wedding gifts and I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cannon

customer_reviews.title: I should have headed the warning of others.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used one of these pie plates it shattered. I simply removed it from the oven and put it on a cooling rack. 10 minutes later the pie plate exploded and shattered everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeNomad

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pie Pans!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! these are really nice pie pans! glad I picked the pyrex ones these are the best! thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the package, I accidentally dropped it from about 3 feet. No scratch, dent... nothing. Love using it to bake.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The plates are made of thick glass. I loved how easy is to wash them, perfect for pie size.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready for chicken pot pies
customer_reviews.text: Learned how to make chicken pot pies. I'm not using tin pans. Many reviews said you should use glass instead of painted ceramic or stoneware so you can see your crust. Makes sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: pulsev2

customer_reviews.title: Little bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Clearly says 9.5 inches. Having to adjust some recipes. Overall, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Lbon

customer_reviews.title: These are WIDE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these are great pie plates, but I have a small oven and the pair will not fit on one shelf. I'm used to 9" frozen crusts that fit easily. I will give these away and try to find narrower pie plates.
customer_reviews.author: Teamonger

customer_reviews.title: I actually wish these were a bit more shallow, ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually wish these were a bit more shallow, I find some difficulty in getting a pie to bake through before the crust burns when using these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jester

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to hold, bakes evenly
customer_reviews.text: Glass baking products are my go-to because I can see how things are baking underneath (no soggy bottoms!) and are durable. It's a little on the heavier side but I don't mind it at all because it feels more sturdy. And the rim is great for primping or gripping with my oven mitts. Huge Pyrex fan and would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great price, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as expected and I am thrilled with the price I paid. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Holland

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, well made and adds to the beauty of serving the finished baked dish.
customer_reviews.author: ilya mirz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and wasn't broken during shipment
customer_reviews.text: I like them they came as a set and i rate it as 100%
customer_reviews.author: Chancie McRae

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and extra capacity (9 1/2" instead of 9"). Have had no breakage issues as others have reported. A prized addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: DCWired

customer_reviews.title: It shatters
customer_reviews.text: It shattered on the 1st use. Cooked a pie at 350. I let it sit out for a few hours. Went to go wash it and it just exploded in the sink. Very dangerous
customer_reviews.author: linda donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cream pie!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cream pie. Baked a golden crust and chilled in the fridge. Presents way nicer than foil pan. Only wish there was a cover.
customer_reviews.author: J&CD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pie plates!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pirex pie plates and even more amazing price! They’re nice and deep and everything you want when making a pie plate!
customer_reviews.author: Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great pie plates
customer_reviews.text: Love these pie plates! Nice quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: louise miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It’s big enough to use in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Love these pie plates
customer_reviews.text: Love these pie plates. Simple pretty design on the edges of the plate. Cooks evenly and nicely. Really like the fact that I can gauge how the bottom of my pie crust is cooking as well. Nice value for 2 pie plates.
customer_reviews.author: dewit1200

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Nice big size, easy to clean, sturdy And attractive
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R Schillawski

customer_reviews.title: Please buy if you like shattered glass in your pie.
customer_reviews.text: Exploded while I was putting pie crust inside. Maybe there's a recall that should be done, I see a lot of the same issues, except mine wasn't even hot yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dish is too deep
customer_reviews.text: My pies would not cook through in the recommended time.. center did not cook. My pies in my other 9 in glass dishes cooked fine. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: alice miller

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bake frequently and my pie plate leave with the pies. I ordered these because they were so cheap. I usually pay much more. I was very surprised and pleased at how pretty they are. When I have to replace them again I’ll definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Gamabunny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These cook and clean up so very nicely! Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Suggs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As expected! Just in time to slave in the kitchen for Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Tarek Ruichi

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I do not like these pie plates! I cannot use my 9 inch pastry rim shield because of the design of the pie plate.
customer_reviews.author: lilyovale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This pie pan is the perfect size to make a nice pie, even a deep dish pie. It has a fluted rim to help make a beautiful fluted crust!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: Such a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price that I had to get them, a great addition to the kitchen. Very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Goodhue

customer_reviews.title: Versatel but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex, has been indispensable and a kitchen staple for 70+ years! They double nicely as dinner plates, my family likes them. My grip is not as strong these days so I prefer a lighter weight dish.
customer_reviews.author: BDK

customer_reviews.title: Pie plate exploded!!
customer_reviews.text: Placed pie plate on counter top to fill with pie crust turned to get pie crust and the plate exploded , glass everywhere, hit my dog and cat, luckily they were not cut. Have no idea why this happened, counter was dry, did not bang the dish, it was scarey and glass got into the food I was preparing.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores M Smith

product_meta.title: Pyrex Easy Grab Glass 9.5 Inch Pie Plate (2-Pack)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 2| Style:PlateThese pie plates have wider Easy Grab rims to give you a sure grip (and serves as a guide for making fluted crusts). A classic for sweet or savory pies, quiches and more, the tempered Pyrex glass can go directly into a preheated oven, and it heats evenly for consistent results. And they work beautifully for no-bake and freezer pies. This set includes (2) 9-1/2 in Easy Grab Pie Plates.
feature_bullets: These 9-1/2 sized pie plates are ideal for most recipes and have Easy Grab rims for a sure grip. This is the perfect pair for doubling up your baking!
Durable high-quality tempered glass is dishwasher, freezer, microwave and preheated oven safe
Nonporous glass won’t absorb food odors, flavors, or stains

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
